name: D'Crossier - Flor de D’Crossier 512 - Magníficos
additionalNotes: D’Crossier Cigars are often known as “the best kept secret in the cigar industry”. Packed with rich flavor and impeccable draw, the Flor De D'Crossier Selection 512 is offered in two wrapper selections. Depending on your mood or preference there is an Ecuadorian Habano or Mexican San Andres wrapped cigar for your enjoyment. Made for Pure Aroma Cigars, Isaias Santana Diaz blended two great lines that hardly ever disappoint.
